name: @freesewing/models
description: Body measurements data for a range of default sizes
author: Joost De Cock <joost@decock.org> (https://github.com/joostdecock)

scripts.patch: npm version patch -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.major: npm version major -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.browserbuild: rollup -c rollup.js --file dist/browser.js --format iife -n freesewing_models --footer 'freesewing.models = freesewing_models'
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run browserbuild && npm run nodebuild && npm run modulebuild
